articles.content: State-owned SJVN on Saturday said its green energy subsidiary has bagged a 200MW solar project entailing an investment of Rs 1,000 crore in Maharashtra. "Wholly-owned subsidiary of the company...SJVN… [+925 chars]

articles.title: As Forex Reserve Falls To 3-Month Low, Subramanian Swamy Says Economic Crisis Inevitable - Zee News
articles.description: Modi’s political colleagues are too frightened to tell him like it is in the economy. Modi himself is ignorant of economics, so the crisis is inevitable due to Govt being clueless, said Swamy in a tweet.
